item.title: CVE-2021-42364|2024-09-16T22:25:55.544Z -- stetic -- stetic
item.description: The Stetic WordPress plugin is vulnerable to Cross-Site Request Forgery due to missing nonce validation via the stats_page function found in the ~/stetic.php file, which made it possible for attackers to inject arbitrary web scripts in versions up to, and including 1.0.6.
